name: John Doe
title: Full Stack Developer - Tech Lead
objective: To make high-quality, exciting, and fun web and mobile applications that are challenging, provide opportunities to learn new technologies, and allow me to work with other highly motivated and talented developers.
aboutme: I am passionate about writing and testing my code, learning new things, and teaching others. I enjoy understanding problems, finding their solutions, making them simplified. I enjoy writing and contributing to open source software.  I also enjoy speaking at conferences and local user groups about JavaScript.

projects.name: TeamWork Web
projects.description: Teamwork is a communication tool for teams, where indidual can make calls, send messages, create tasks, create events and other functionalities of unified communication.
projects.role: Part of design discussion, write components for various features

projects.name: Design V2 NextGen
projects.technologies: Object Oriented JavaScript, NodeJS, Grunt, GIT
projects.description: Next Gen Cdk websites has to accomodate the new manifest.json from the file system to apply the new themes and design provided by designers. My role is to write and test code, doing code-reviews, helping my team of 5 people for any techical or domain specific issues.
projects.role: Write directives in using Co framework to ease the design change of a given NextGen site.

projects.name: Dealer Group Location
projects.description: Showing the car dealers of a particular group on Google Map using googleMapAPI and help the buyer to locate the appropriate dealer based on his shared location.
projects.role: My role was to interact with the REST API and show the desired behavior.

projects.name: www.alexandermini.com
projects.description: Alexander Mini is one of the most famous car dealer website which requested for a full white plane theme to be created with in short span of time. Not only we created this theme for http://www.alexandermini.com/ but for all the mini dealers in US.

projects.name: EDO(Enhance Design Options) for all the CDK websites
projects.description: This project is about adding many features like Stiky Navigation, New Navigations, Enlarged Header & Footer to be added to all the CDK websites. CDK owns more than 10000 websites around the world.

projects.name: www.sewell.com

projects.description: Project sewell is a website build for group of car dealers in United States. It is a responsive website supporting digital marketing of cars.

projects.name: Flex+ Solution : http://stevinsonauto.com on mobile

projects.description: Flex+ is a solution for dealer websites which are not responsive. It is adaptive layout design for each page and rendering using wicket code. Url: http://www.stevinsonauto.com/?device=mobile

projects.description: ACB provide a call tracking and scheduling system for business process executives.

projects.name: Contact Management System
projects.technologies: jQuery, Backbone.js, LESS, HTML5, Twitter Bootstrap, Jasmine
projects.description: CMS generates scripts for the agent (say BPO) to communicate easily with the client. These scripts or web pages are able to collect data from the user and can be configured any time to change the flow of business.

projects.name: LRM (Loan Resolution Model)
projects.description: LRM is one the highest revenue-making product of Altisource for its client Ocwen(Home Mortgage company in US). As the name suggest it provides various options to the customer which are default or going to be default on their loan, i.e., imminent default. My responsibility is to provide a web app for doing so.
